reviewText: Results of the restoration were fantastic. I like the details.
I would buy this if I hadn't given up hope on more DVDs months ago and bought the rest of the shows on ITunes.
I always enjoy watching them repair anything that is brought in to them, but I don't enjoy the silly way Rick shows the finished product to the customer.
I have all three volumes. Every episode is interesting. Great show even if you don't know a thing about restoring.

It's great to see Rick and his team restoring things to look like new
in their expanded and well equipped facility.

American Restoration is one my favorite shows to watch and I was glad when this DVD was released. I just wish they would come out faster. I love seeing how these people turn people's old junk into something that is so close to being called a work of art and hearing the stories about and behind the items that are restored.

We truly wish History would show every Full Season with their Episodes (same goes for Pawn Stars, Pickers & Counting Cars!) Be that as it may: 1st 1 on this Disc is 1 of my Favorites: Ridin' Route 66 (featuring Angel the Barber in AZ). I've visited him many a time. Always so sweet & kind. We need MORE folks like him. Anyway: there are 16 Episodes on these 2 discs ending with Hot & Salty. We admire how Rick & Company can turn a pile of stuff into a work of art! Looking forward to the new Season!!!
